<math alttext="22.17 milliliters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>22.17</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 

An antacid tablet containing <math alttext="M g, open parenthesis, O H, close parenthesis, 2, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Mg(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (molar mass <math alttext="58.3 grams per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>58.3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) is titrated with a <math alttext="0.100 molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> solution of <math alttext="H N O 3, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>HNO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. The end point is determined by using an indicator. Based on the data in the table above, what was the mass of the <math alttext="M g, open parenthesis, O H, close parenthesis, 2, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Mg(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> in the antacid tablet?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
